nodes.text: Prominence was a Judicial Forces Consular-class cruiser.

It was part of a mission dispatched to Asmeru in 33 BBY by Supreme Chancellor Finis Valorum to apprehend the leaders of the Nebula Front. Prominence and its sister ship, the Ecliptic, came under attack by Nebula Front forces, with the Prominence crashing onto the planet, where it was destroyed. All twelve crewmembers survived, however, only to be captured by the Front.
On its final mission, the Prominence was crewed by:
